verses.verse: Then <WG1899> after<WG1223> the space of fourteen<WG1180> years<WG2094> I went up<WG305> again<WG3825> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> with<WG3326> Barnabas<WG921>, taking<WG4838> Titus<WG5103> also<WG2532> with me<WG4838>.

And <WG1161> I went up<WG305> by<WG2596> revelation<WG602>; and<WG2532> I laid<WG394> before them<WG846> the gospel<WG2098> which<WG3739> I preach<WG2784> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG2596> but<WG1161> privately<WG2398> before them who<WG3588> were of repute<WG1380>, lest by any means<WG3381> I should be running<WG5143>, or<WG2228> had run<WG5143>, in<WG1519> vain<WG2756>.
But <WG235> not even<WG3761> Titus<WG5103> who was<WG3588> with<WG4862> me<WG1698>, being<WG5607> a Greek<WG1672>, was compelled<WG315> to be circumcised<WG4059>:

and that<WG1161> because of<WG1223> the false brethren<WG5569> privily brought in<WG3920>, who<WG3748> came in privily<WG3922> to spy out<WG2684> our<WG2257> liberty<WG1657> which<WG3739> we have<WG2192> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, that<WG2443> they might bring<WG2615> us<WG2248> into bondage<WG2615>:

to whom<WG3739> we gave place<WG1502> in the way of subjection<WG5292>, no<WG3761>, not for<WG4314> an hour<WG5610>; that<WG2443> the truth<WG225> of the gospel<WG2098> might continue<WG1265> with<WG4314> you<WG5209>.

But <WG1161> from<WG575> those who<WG3588> were<WG1380> reputed to be<WG1511> somewhat<WG5100> (whatsoever3697, 4218 they were<WG2258>, it maketh<WG1308> no<WG3762> matter<WG1308> to me<WG3427>: God<WG2316> accepteth<WG2983> not<WG3756> man<WG444>'s person<WG4383>) <WG1063> â€”they, I say<WG3588>, who were<WG1380> of repute imparted<WG4323> nothing<WG3762> to me<WG1698>:

but <WG235> contrariwise<WG5121>, when they saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> I had been intrusted<WG4100> with the gospel<WG2098> of the uncircumcision<WG203>, even as<WG2531> Peter<WG4074> with the gospel of the circumcision<WG4061>

(for <WG1063> he that<WG3588> wrought<WG1754> for Peter<WG4074> unto<WG1519> the apostleship<WG651> of the circumcision<WG4061> wrought<WG1754> for me<WG1698> also<WG2532> unto<WG1519> the Gentiles<WG1484>);

and <WG2532> when they perceived<WG1097> the grace<WG5485> that<WG3588> was given<WG1325> unto me<WG3427>, James<WG2532> and<WG2532> Cephas<WG2786> and John<WG2491>, they who<WG3588> were reputed<WG1380> to be<WG1511> pillars<WG4769>, gave<WG1325> to me<WG1698> and<WG2532> Barnabas<WG921> the right hands<WG1188> of fellowship<WG2842>, that<WG2443> we<WG2249> should go unto<WG1519> the Gentiles<WG1484>, and<WG1161> they<WG846> unto<WG1519> the circumcision<WG4061>;
only <WG3440> they would that<WG2443> we should remember<WG3421> the poor<WG4434>; which<WG3739> very<WG846> thing<WG5124> I was also<WG2532> zealous<WG4704> to do<WG4160>.
But <WG1161> when<WG3753> Cephas<WG4074> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> Antioch<WG490>, I resisted<WG436> him<WG846> to<WG2596> the face<WG4383>, because<WG3754> he stood<WG2258> condemned<WG2607>.

For <WG1063> before<WG4253> that<WG3588> certain<WG5100> came<WG2064> from<WG575> James<WG2385>, he ate<WG4906> with<WG3326> the Gentiles<WG1484>; but<WG1161> when<WG3753> they came<WG2064>, he drew back<WG5288> and<WG2532> separated<WG873> himself<WG1438>, fearing<WG5399> them that<WG3588> were of<WG1537> the circumcision<WG4061>.

And <WG2532> the rest<WG3062> of the Jews<WG2453> dissembled<WG4942> likewise<WG2532> with him<WG846>; insomuch that<WG5620> even<WG2532> Barnabas<WG921> was carried away with<WG4879> their<WG846> dissimulation<WG5272>.

But <WG235> when<WG3753> I saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> they walked<WG3716> not<WG3756> uprightly<WG3716> according to<WG4314> the truth<WG225> of the gospel<WG2098>, I said<WG2036> unto Cephas<WG4074> before<WG1715> them all<WG3956>, If<WG1487> thou<WG4771>, being<WG5225> a Jew<WG2453>, livest<WG2198> as do the Gentiles<WG1483>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> as do the Jews<WG2452>, how<WG5101> compellest thou<WG315> the Gentiles<WG1484> to live as do the Jews<WG2450>?
We <WG2249> being Jews<WG2453> by nature<WG5449>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> sinners<WG268> of<WG1537> the Gentiles<WG1484>,

yet knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> a man<WG444> is<WG1344> not<WG3756> justified<WG1344> by<WG1537> the works<WG2041> of the law<WG3551> but1437, 3361 through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> in<WG1519> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, even<WG2532> we<WG2249> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, that<WG2443> we might be justified<WG1344> by<WG1537> faith<WG4102> in Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> by<WG1537> the works<WG2041> of the law<WG3551>: because by<WG1360> the works<WG2041> of<WG1537> the law<WG3551> shall<WG1344> no<WG3756> flesh<WG4561> be justified<WG1344>.

But <WG1161> if<WG1487>, while we sought<WG2212> to be justified<WG1344> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>, we ourselves<WG846> also<WG2532> were found<WG2147> sinners<WG268>, is<WG687> Christ<WG5547> a minister<WG1249> of sin<WG3361>? God forbid<WG1096>.
For <WG1063> if<WG1487> I build<WG3618> up again<WG3825> those things<WG5023> which<WG3739> I destroyed<WG2647>, I prove<WG4921> myself<WG1683> a transgressor<WG3848>.
For <WG1063> I<WG1473> through<WG1223> the law<WG3551> died<WG599> unto the law<WG3551>, that<WG2443> I might live<WG2198> unto God<WG2316>.

I have been crucified with<WG4957> Christ<WG5547>; and<WG1161> it is no<WG3765> longer I<WG1473> that live<WG2198>, but<WG1161> Christ<WG5547> living<WG2198> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>: and<WG1161> that life which<WG3739> I<WG2198> now<WG3568> live<WG2198> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561> I live<WG2198> in<WG1722> faith<WG4102>, the faith which is in the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, who<WG3588> loved<WG25> me<WG3165>, and<WG2532> gave<WG3860> himself<WG1438> up for<WG5228> me<WG1700>.

I do<WG114> not<WG3756> make void<WG114> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316>: for<WG1063> if<WG1487> righteousness<WG1343> is through<WG1223> the law<WG3551>, then<WG686> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599> for nought<WG1432>.
